content:
APR Performance is a well-known and reputable company in the industry, and they have a great reputation for designing and manufacturing high-performance aerodynamic components.

I don't have personal experiences or direct feedback from individuals who have worked with APR Performance, but I can tell you that they have a strong online presence and a large customer base. You can find many reviews, testimonials, and feedback from satisfied customers on their website, social media, and online forums.

APR Performance is known for their expertise in aerodynamics and their ability to design and manufacture high-quality, performance-oriented components. They have a team of experienced engineers and designers who work closely with customers to understand their needs and create custom solutions that meet their performance goals.

If you're considering reaching out to APR Performance, I would recommend doing so. They can provide you with expert guidance and support throughout the design and manufacturing process, and they have a proven track record of delivering high-quality products.

Some tips when reaching out to APR Performance:

1. Be prepared to provide detailed information about your vehicle, including the make, model, year, and any modifications you've already made.
2. Clearly communicate your performance goals and what you're looking to achieve with your custom rear spoiler.
3. Ask about their design process, materials, and manufacturing techniques to ensure they align with your expectations.
4. Inquire about their testing and validation process to ensure that their products meet high standards of quality and performance.
5. Don't hesitate to ask questions or request references from previous customers.

By working with a reputable company like APR Performance, you can be confident that you'll receive a high-quality, custom rear spoiler that meets your performance goals and enhances your Civic Type R's aerodynamics.
